entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is a wizard. He is described as stepping backward, tripping, and landing in the gutter.

entities.name: knight bus
entities.description: A triple-decker bus that appears out of thin air. It has gold lettering over the windshield and a purple uniformed conductor.

entities.name: conductor
entities.description: The person in charge of the Knight Bus. They are described as wearing a purple uniform and speaking loudly to the night.

relationships.description: Harry is transported by the Knight Bus, which appears out of thin air and stops exactly where Harry was lying.
The conductor operates the Knight Bus, speaking loudly to the night and welcoming passengers.
